statements: UPDATE network_traffic_data SET data_size = 500 WHERE logging_id = 1;

UPDATE network_traffic_data SET data_size = 500 WHERE id = 101;

UPDATE suspicious_activities SET reason = 'Suspicious activity detected' WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND reason IS NULL;
